wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.name: contentText
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.description: Text to describe the route name or number of the mode of transport.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.name: iconRight
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.description: The icon tag which specifies the icon to show to the right of the indicator (see icon reference). By default, no icon will be displayed.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.name: iconLeft
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.description: The icon tag which specifies the icon to show to the left of the indicator (see icon reference). By default, no icon will be displayed.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.name: iconRightBtn
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.description: If set to true the right icon will be displayed as a clickable button. Default value is false.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.name: displayNarrow
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.description: If set to true, the badge will be displayed in the narrow style. Default value is false.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.name: classes
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorMediumProps.description: List of additional classes which will be added to the disruption indicator. A typical use case is modifying the badge colour to indicate severity e.g. wmnds-disruption-indicator-medium--severe
